about_the_game: Super Barnyard Buds is a tribute to the video game soundtracks of old, to the genius composers who worked on consoles like the Super Nintendo and the Sega Genesis. If you’re a fan of chiptunes or VGM from the late ‘80s and early ‘90s, these SNES inspired tunes will be a welcome burst of nostalgia!
detailed_description: Super Barnyard Buds is a tribute to the video game soundtracks of old, to the genius composers who worked on consoles like the Super Nintendo and the Sega Genesis. If you’re a fan of chiptunes or VGM from the late ‘80s and early ‘90s, these SNES inspired tunes will be a welcome burst of nostalgia!
name: Happy's Humble Burger Farm: Super Barnyard Buds (OST)
